name: 黃如瑩
objective: 當代英美流行小說,例如:帶珍珠耳環的少女,時空旅人之妻,姊姊的守護者,暮光之城系列等等,主題推陳出新,內容扣人心弦,有的反應當前的文化議題,有的表現出創新的文學想像,在在都激發著同學們閱讀原文小說的興趣.又由於小說的書寫語言為當今英語世界所使用,沒有年代隔閡,所以原文流行小說也是優良的英語學習材料.在字彙,片語,句型,段落及文章結構,到故事情節發展與深入探討主題的每個層面上,都提供了豐富的素材,供同學們學習觀摩.因此,本課程將挑選不同類型之時下英美流行小說四本,每月一本,規劃進度,在課堂上進行導讀與討論,並加強字彙,句型,與文章結構上的分析,幫助同學們在英語書寫,閱讀技巧,跨文化了解與思辨能力上,獲得最大的進步!
schedule:
Syllabus 課程表:
Week 1: Introduction, the Best Offer 寂寞拍賣師
Theme One: Going through the labyrinth 闖越迷宮
Week 2: The Giver 記憶傳授人 
by Lois Lowry 
Week 3: The Maze Runner 移動迷宮 
by James Dashner
Week 4: The Hunger Games 飢餓遊戲 
by Suzanne Collins
Week 5: The City of Amber 微光城市 
by Jeanne DuPrau
Theme Two: Solving the Mystery  解開謎團
Week 6: Sherlock Holmes and John Watson 福爾摩斯
by Authur Conan Doyle
Week 7: The Girl with the Dragon Tatoos 龍紋身的女孩 
by Stieg Larsson
Week 8: The Girl with the Pearl Earring 戴珍珠耳環的少女 
by Tracy Chevalier
Week 9 (Mid-term exam week): Gone Girl 控制 
by Gillian Flynn
Theme Three:  Looking for the Self 尋找自我
Week 10: The Perks of Being a Wallflower 壁花男孩 
by Stephen Chbosky
Week 11: The Help 姊妹 
by Kathryn Stockett
Week 12: Alice in the Wonderland 愛麗絲夢遊仙境 
by C. S. Lewis
Week 13: The Golden Compass 黃金羅盤 
by Philip Pullman
Week 14: The Kite Runner 追風箏的孩子 
by Khaled Hosseini
Theme Four: Love and Passion
Week 15: Stardust 星塵傳奇 by Neil Gaiman
Week 16: The Book Thief 偷書賊 by Markus Zusak
Week 17:  The Time Traveler's Wife 時空旅人之妻 
by Audrey Niffenegger
Week 18 (Final examination week): Wrapping up
scorePolicy:
Percentile of final grades 成績配分:
1. Group presentation in the class: 5 % X 3 = 15 %
2. Individual tasks (homework, solo presentation, FB comments): 
3 % X 15 = 45 %
3. Novel reading and discussions with Vinia: 10% X 2 = 20 %
4. Attendance and participation: 20 % (- 4 % each absence)
